quest.name: Flower for a Friend
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The taciturn miner is planning a journey of great personal importance.
objectives: Cast a commemorative flower into the ravine.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: Excuse me, sinner. I am planning a journey into dangerous territory and need a bodyguard. Can you help me?

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: My destination is the bridge that stretches across the northern chasm. I should be able to reach it but I will need you to watch my back once I arrive. There is something I must do...

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: This is where a close friend of mine lost his life. He was a miner, one of the best. Until the day he was attacked by a sin eater.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: After Daedalus Stoneworks closed and the Talos fell into disrepair, he tried to find alternative methods for operating the trolleys, such as having them pulled by lizards. It was during one of these trials that he met his end.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: Though you are an outsider and never met him, it would mean a lot to me if you could join me in paying respects. Here, cast this flower into the ravine.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: Do you have customs like this where you come from?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You pay your respects by offering a flower for the lost miner.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: I wonder if he is watching us now, alongside all of the other great Ronso of the past. Many of the villages and mountains in Amh Araeng bear their names.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: My friend and I once dreamed of opening mines and naming them after ourselves. I still hold on to that hope, even though he is no longer with us.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: I can tell you too have lost loved ones. What do you do to overcome the grief?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I try to concentrate on the here and now.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: When the tears come, I let them flow.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: We each find our own way. You must find yours.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: Yes, there are others that still need us. Deeds that must be done.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: Yes, only by accepting the pain in our hearts can we hope to move on.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: Yes, you are right. True strength must come from within.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: I am grateful for your kind words.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: I shall reflect on them as we journey back to Twine.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: I was glad to have someone to hear my friend's tale. For in the telling, I was able to look back on happier times. From this day forth, I will strive to uphold the ideals that we once shared and in so doing, honor his memory.

dialogue.name: RONSO03501
dialogue.text: Please accept this as a small token of my thanks.
